ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the time and thoughtful contributions of the many study participants in each of the three countries. The authors also thank Martin Gross, Siobhan Malone, and Maaya Sundaram of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation for their contributions to the country-level case study research effort; and Oliver Campbell White for copy editing and proof-reading of the manuscript.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: Funding for this research was provided by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The data supporting the conclusions of this article are included within the article and its additional files (Additional file 1).
